translated: Among the eighteen elements, it is included in one element, the element of mental objects.

original: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi nang nas skye mched gcig dang / chos kyi skye mched de /
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi nang nas skye mched gcig dang / chos kyi skye mched de /
translated: Among the twelve sense bases, it is included in one sense base, the sense base of mental objects.

original: de'i phyogs dang chos kyi skye mched brgyad las 'du shes kyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyogs dang chos kyi skye mched brgyad las 'du shes kyis so //
translated: It is included in the eight of those that are mental objects.

original: srid pa'i yan lag gsum gyi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag gsum gyi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in three members of existence.

original: ming dang gzugs dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas 'du shes kyi phyogs re re bzung bas so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas 'du shes kyi phyogs re re bzung bas so //
translated: Among name-and-form, birth, and old-age-and-death, it is included in the part of perception.

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in one part of the possible and impossible.

original: 'du shes kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu la nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas pa yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu la nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas pa yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
translated: It is included in the part of the possible and impossible that is the cause and result of perception.

original: dbang po ni gang gis kyang ma bsdus so //
analyzed: dbang po ni gang gis kyang ma bsdus so //
translated: It is not included in any of the faculties.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po ni phung po gcig kho nas bsdus te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po ni phung po gcig kho nas bsdus te /
translated: The formation aggregate is included in one aggregate.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po nyid kyis so //
translated: It is included in the formation aggregate itself.

original: khams dang skye mched gcig gi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: khams dang skye mched gcig gi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in one part of the elements and the sense bases.

original: khams bco brgyad kyi nang nas khams gcig ni chos kyi khams te /üîΩde'i 'og ni brgyad pa las 'du byed do //
analyzed: khams bco brgyad kyi nang nas khams gcig ni chos kyi khams te / de'i 'og ni brgyad pa las 'du byed do //
translated: Among the eighteen elements, one element is the mental object element.üîΩThe next line of the Abhidharmako≈õa states, ‚ÄúThe formations heap is in the mental object element.‚Äù

original: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi nang nas /
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi nang nas /
translated: Among the twelve sense bases,

original: skye mched gcig kyang chos kyi skye mched de /
analyzed: skye mched gcig kyang chos kyi skye mched de /
translated: one sense base is the mental object sense base.

original: de'i phyogs kyang chos kyi skye mched brgyad las 'du byed kyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyogs kyang chos kyi skye mched brgyad las 'du byed kyis so //
translated: The part of the truth of origin that is not included in the truth of the origin is included in the eight bases of existence, since it is included in the formation base.

original: srid pa'i yan lag bzhis bsdus te /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag bzhis bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in the four branches of existence:

original: ma rig pa dang / reg pa dang / sred pa dang / len pas so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / reg pa dang / sred pa dang / len pas so //
translated: ignorance, contact, craving, and grasping.

original: srid pa'i yan lag lnga'i phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag lnga'i phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in the five branches of existence:

original: 'du byed dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas gzugs la sogs pa ma yin pa 'du byed kyi @47a * //üîΩphyogs re re bzung bas so //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas gzugs la sogs pa ma yin pa 'du byed kyi @47a * // phyogs re re bzung bas so //
translated: the part of formation, name and form, existence, birth, and aging and death, but not form and so on.

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in one part of the possible and impossible:

original: 'du byed kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu ma nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu ma nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
translated: the part of the possible and impossible that is the unerring cause and result of formation.

original: dbang po drug gis bsdus te /
analyzed: dbang po drug gis bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in the six faculties:

original: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang pos so //
analyzed: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang pos so //
translated: the faculties of faith, effort, mindfulness, concentration, wisdom and life force.

original: dbang po gsum gyi phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
analyzed: dbang po gsum gyi phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in the three faculties.

original: mi shes pa kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gsum po re re la yang dbang po dgu dgu yod pa las /
analyzed: mi shes pa kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gsum po re re la yang dbang po dgu dgu yod pa las /
translated: Each of the three faculties‚Äîthe faculty of understanding what has not been understood, the faculty of perfect knowledge, and the faculty of the possession of perfect knowledge‚Äîhas nine faculties.

original: dad pa la sogs pa lnga'i phyogs re re bzung bas so //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i phung po ni phung po gcig kho nas bsdus te /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa lnga'i phyogs re re bzung bas so // rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni phung po gcig kho nas bsdus te /
translated: Each of the five faculties beginning with faith is included in one of these three faculties.üîΩThe aggregate of consciousness is included in one aggregate.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid kyis so //
translated: It is included in the aggregate of consciousness.

original: khams bdun gyis bsdus te /
analyzed: khams bdun gyis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in seven elements.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang / yid kyi khams kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang / yid kyi khams kyis so //
translated: It is included in the six consciousness elements and the mental faculty element.

original: skye mched gcig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: skye mched gcig gis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in one sense base.

original: chos kyi skye mched kyis so //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched kyis so //
translated: It is included in the sense base of mental objects.

original: srid pa'i yan lag gcig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag gcig gis bsdus te /
translated: It is included in one member of existence.

original: rnam par shes pas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas so //
translated: It is included in the member of consciousness.

original: srid pa'i yan lag bzhi'i phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag bzhi'i phyogs kyis kyang bsdus te /
translated: It is also included in four members of existence.

original: ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas rnam par shes pa'i phyogs re re bzung bas so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i nang nas rnam par shes pa'i phyogs re re bzung bas so //
translated: The aggregates of name-and-form, the six sense bases, birth, and aging-and-death are included in the side of consciousness.

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis bsdus te /
translated: They are included in the side of the possible and the impossible.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu ma nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu ma nor ba'i gnas dang / nor ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyogs kyis so //
translated: The side of the possible is the cause of consciousness and the side of the impossible is not the cause of consciousness.

original: dbang po gcig gis bsdus te /
analyzed: dbang po gcig gis bsdus te /
translated: They are included in one faculty.

original: yid kyi dbang pos so //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang pos so //
translated: They are included in the mental faculty.

original: dbang po gsum gyi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: dbang po gsum gyi phyogs kyis bsdus te /
translated: They are included in the side of three faculties.

original: mi shes pa kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gsum po re re la yang dbang po dgu dgu yod pa las /
analyzed: mi shes pa kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gsum po re re la yang dbang po dgu dgu yod pa las /
translated: The three faculties of not yet knowing, knowing, and having known are each included in nine faculties.

original: yid kyi dbang po'i phyogs re re bzung bas so //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po'i phyogs re re bzung bas so //
translated: They are included in the side of the mental faculty.

original: phung po rnams kyis bsdus pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rnam grangs gzhan yang rnam pa bcu yod de /
analyzed: phung po rnams kyis bsdus pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rnam grangs gzhan yang rnam pa bcu yod de /
translated: There are ten other ways of positing the aggregates.

original: khams kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid dang rang gi sa bon gyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: khams kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid dang rang gi sa bon gyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is included by the elements is that which is included by those very aggregates and by their seeds.

original: mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is included by characteristics is that which is included by those very aggregates and by their general and specific characteristics.

original: rigs @47b kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rang gi rigs zad par gyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rigs @47b kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rang gi rigs zad par gyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is included by type is that which is included by those very aggregates and by their own types.

original: gnas skabs kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is included by state is that which is included by those very aggregates and by their states, such as that which is compatible with pleasant feeling.

original: tha mi dad pas bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid kyis chos re re yang phung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pas bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid kyis chos re re yang phung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is included by non-differentiation is that which is included by those very aggregates and by each phenomenon, by all the aggregates and their retinue.

original: dus kyis bsdus pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phung po de dag nyid dus de nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyis bsdus pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phung po de dag nyid dus de nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those same aggregates included in the past, future, and present are included by time.

original: yul gyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid yul gang du 'jug pa dang / gnas gang nas 'byung ba'i yul de nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid yul gang du 'jug pa dang / gnas gang nas 'byung ba'i yul de nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those same aggregates included in a certain place and arising from a certain place are included by place.

original: mtha' dag gis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid lnga nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //üîΩphyogs gcig gis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rnam par phye na /
analyzed: mtha' dag gis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid lnga nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o // phyogs gcig gis bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid rnam par phye na /
translated: Those same aggregates included in the five are included in their entirety.

original: gcig gi nang na gzhan med pa'i rang rang gi phyogs kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gcig gi nang na gzhan med pa'i rang rang gi phyogs kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those same aggregates included in a part are included in a part of the aggregates when they are distinguished.

original: don dam pas bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pas bsdus pa ni phung po de dag nyid de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those same aggregates included in the ultimate are included in suchness.

original: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas phung po rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam pa bcu drug yod de /
analyzed: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas phung po rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam pa bcu drug yod de /
translated: All of these are combined into one, and there are sixteen types of combination of the aggregates.

original: de ni phung po rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni phung po rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the combination of the aggregates.

original: de la phung po rnams kyi rten par gzhag pa ni gzugs kyi phung po ni gnas bu dag las brten nas 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: de la phung po rnams kyi rten par gzhag pa ni gzugs kyi phung po ni gnas bu dag las brten nas 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: The presentation of the basis of the aggregates is as follows: The form aggregate arises in dependence on the six bases.

original: ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po dag ni gnas du dag las brten nas 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po dag ni gnas du dag las brten nas 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: In dependence on how many bases do the aggregates that are included in name arise?

original: gzugs kyi phung po ni gnas drug la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po ni gnas drug la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: The form aggregate arises in dependence on six bases.

original: rten gyi gnas snod kyi 'jig rten dang / gnas kyi gnas khang khyim la sogs pa dang / yo byad kyi gnas yo byad bcu dang / dbang po'i gnas dgur byas pa'i gzugs dang / dbang po'i rten gyi gnas 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs dang /
analyzed: rten gyi gnas snod kyi 'jig rten dang / gnas kyi gnas khang khyim la sogs pa dang / yo byad kyi gnas yo byad bcu dang / dbang po'i gnas dgur byas pa'i gzugs dang / dbang po'i rten gyi gnas 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs dang /
translated: The basis of the abode is the physical cosmos. The basis of the abode is the house and so on. The basis of requisites is the ten requisites. The basis of the sense faculties is the nine forms of form. The basis of the support of the sense faculties is the form of the great elements.

original: mthu las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gnas bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa'i gzugs la'o //
analyzed: mthu las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gnas bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa'i gzugs la'o //
translated: It is the object of the concentration arisen from the supernormal powers, and it is the formless realm.

original: ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po dag ni gnas bdun la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te /üîΩ'dod pa dang / re ba dang / yul dang / @48a * //
analyzed: ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po dag ni gnas bdun la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur te / 'dod pa dang / re ba dang / yul dang / @48a * //
translated: The aggregates included in name are distributed among seven bases.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag par shes pa dang / dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / dag pa la'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag par shes pa dang / dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / dag pa la'o //
translated: They are distributed among the base of contact, the base of ideas, the base of the formative forces, the base of the elements not liable to manifest, the base of neither perception nor non-perception, and the base of the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyi gnas skabs ni bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyi gnas skabs ni bzhi'o //
translated: The base of contact is the four aggregates associated with the five forms of sense consciousness.üîΩThe base of ideas is the aggregate of ideas associated with the sixth consciousness.

original: sdom pa la gnas pa'i sdom brtson pa rnams kyi ni gcig go //üîΩnyer bsdogs thob pa mnyam par gzhag pa rnams kyi yang gcig go //
analyzed: sdom pa la gnas pa'i sdom brtson pa rnams kyi ni gcig go // nyer bsdogs thob pa mnyam par gzhag pa rnams kyi yang gcig go //
translated: The base of the formative forces is the aggregate of the formative forces.üîΩThe base of the elements not liable to manifest is the aggregate of consciousness dissociated from the elements liable to manifest.üîΩThe base of neither perception nor non-perception is the fourth trance state.

original: dngos gzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi yang gcig go //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi yang gcig go //
translated: The base of the cessation of perception and feeling is the attainment of the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: de ltar na gnas bdun po de dag ni gnas skabs bzhir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na gnas bdun po de dag ni gnas skabs bzhir 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, these seven bases are distributed among the four states.

original: de ni phung po rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni phung po rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the distribution of the bases in regard to the aggregates.

original: phung po rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag ni sems can du ston pa yin pa'i phyir des ni sems can du gdags pa'i dngos po bstan to //
analyzed: phung po rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag ni sems can du ston pa yin pa'i phyir des ni sems can du gdags pa'i dngos po bstan to //
translated: The aggregates are the basis of the designation of sentient beings, as has been explained.

original: de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po zhes bya bas ni skye mched rnams kyis bstan te /
analyzed: de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po zhes bya bas ni skye mched rnams kyis bstan te /
translated: The bases are the basis of the designation of the enjoyments of sentient beings.

original: de las skye mched ni bcu gnyis te /üîΩmig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
analyzed: de las skye mched ni bcu gnyis te / mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
translated: The bases are twelve:

original: reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: the eye base, the form base, the ear base, the sound base, the nose base, the smell base, the tongue base, the taste base, the body base, the tangible base, the mental faculty base, and the entity base.

original: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa bcu drug gis bstan te /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa bcu drug gis bstan te /
translated: The bases are also explained in sixteen topics.

original: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
translated: 1. by way of their nature, 2. by way of their meaning, 3. by way of their classification, 4. by way of their order, 5. by way of their inclusion, and 6. by way of their support.

original: de la skye mched rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the establishment of their nature?

original: mig gi skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid ni mig thob cing ma spangs la /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid ni mig thob cing ma spangs la /
translated: The nature of the eye-source is the attainment of the eye that has not been abandoned,

original: de ma thag tu lus la 'gog pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ma thag tu lus la 'gog pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and is not the dharma of cessation immediately following it.

original: mig gi skye mched ji lta ba bzhin du skye mched lhag ma rnams kyang ngo bo nyid las de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched ji lta ba bzhin du skye mched lhag ma rnams kyang ngo bo nyid las de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
translated: The remaining sources should be understood in the same way as the eye-source, according to their nature.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the establishment of the nature of the sources.

original: de la skye mched rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the establishment of the meaning of the sources?

original: rnam pa gnyis te /üîΩnges pa'i tshig dang / dgos pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis te / nges pa'i tshig dang / dgos pa'o //
translated: It is twofold:üîΩ1. by way of their verbal definition, and 2. by way of their necessity.

original: de la nges pa'i tshig ni ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i tshig ni ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhe na /
translated: What is their verbal definition?

original: skye mched kyi don bstan pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched kyi don bstan pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúsource‚Äù is taught.

original: de ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo'i don dang / rkyen gyi don dang / thabs kyi don dang / tshogs @48b pa'i dngos po'i don dang / rten gyi don dang / de dag snang ba'i gnas kyi don to //
analyzed: de ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo'i don dang / rkyen gyi don dang / thabs kyi don dang / tshogs @48b pa'i dngos po'i don dang / rten gyi don dang / de dag snang ba'i gnas kyi don to //
translated: It is the door of arising of the mind and mental activities, the meaning of condition, the meaning of method, the meaning of the collection of things, the meaning of support, and the meaning of the place where they appear.

original: dgos pa ni ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: dgos pa ni ci'i phyir na /
translated: What is the purpose?

original: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa yongs su bstan ce na /
analyzed: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa yongs su bstan ce na /
translated: Why is the presentation of the sense bases taught?

original: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa'i dgos pa bstan pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang / dmigs pa dang / bdag po'i rkyen rnams pa gsum yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir mched rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa'i dgos pa bstan pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang / dmigs pa dang / bdag po'i rkyen rnams pa gsum yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir mched rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: The presentation of the sense bases is taught in order to demonstrate the three kinds of conditions: the immediately preceding condition, the objective support condition, and the dominant condition.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the meaning of the sense bases.

original: de la skye mched rnams phyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams phyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the classification of the sense bases?

original: mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu blta bar bya ste /
translated: In brief, it should be understood in six ways.

original: skye ba'i sgo'i skye mched mig la sogs pa dag gi skye mched rnams so //
analyzed: skye ba'i sgo'i skye mched mig la sogs pa dag gi skye mched rnams so //
translated: The doors of birth are the sense-spheres of the eye, etc.

original: dag pa'i skye mched ni gang zag rigs la gnas pa rnams kyi skye mched gang dag yin pa'o //üîΩrang bzhin gyi skye mched ni skye mched bcu gnyis po de dag nyid thog ma med pa'i dus nas skye ba dang / phyi ma dag rab tu grub pa gang yin pa dang / gang zag rigs la gnas pa dang / rigs la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
analyzed: dag pa'i skye mched ni gang zag rigs la gnas pa rnams kyi skye mched gang dag yin pa'o // rang bzhin gyi skye mched ni skye mched bcu gnyis po de dag nyid thog ma med pa'i dus nas skye ba dang / phyi ma dag rab tu grub pa gang yin pa dang / gang zag rigs la gnas pa dang / rigs la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
translated: The pure sense-spheres are those of the person who is established in the spiritual lineage.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa'i chos nyid du grub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa'i chos nyid du grub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The natural sense-spheres are the twelve sense-spheres that have existed since beginningless time, that are established in the future, and that are established as the nature of the Dharma for the person who is established in the spiritual lineage and for the person who is not established in the spiritual lineage, whether they attain final nirvƒÅ·πáa or do not attain final nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: yongs su bsgoms pa'i skye mched ni sngon dge ba dang / mi dge ba yongs su bsgoms pa de dag nyid 'khor bar skye ba dang / 'bri ba dang / bye brag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i skye mched nyid gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsgoms pa'i skye mched ni sngon dge ba dang / mi dge ba yongs su bsgoms pa de dag nyid 'khor bar skye ba dang / 'bri ba dang / bye brag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i skye mched nyid gang yin pa'o //
translated: The bases of complete development are those very wholesome and unwholesome bases that have been developed, which are the bases for the attainment of birth in cyclic existence, for the decrease of birth, for the distinction of birth, and for the attainment of nirvana.

original: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i skye mched ni de dag nyid 'bras bu bskyed nas 'gags pa gang yin pa'o ;
analyzed: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i skye mched ni de dag nyid 'bras bu bskyed nas 'gags pa gang yin pa'o ;
translated: The bases of the production of results are those very bases that have ceased after producing results.

original: /'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i skye mched ni de dag nyid 'bras bu ma bskyed la 'gags pa'am ma 'gags pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: /'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i skye mched ni de dag nyid 'bras bu ma bskyed la 'gags pa'am ma 'gags pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The bases of the non-production of results are those very bases that have ceased or not ceased without producing results.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the classification of the bases.

original: de la skye mched rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the order of the bases?

original: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: In brief, it is twofold:

original: gnyis kyi go rims dang / drug gi go rims so //
analyzed: gnyis kyi go rims dang / drug gi go rims so //
translated: the order of the two and the order of the six.

original: de la gnyis kyi go rims ni nang dang phyi ste /
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi go rims ni nang dang phyi ste /
translated: As for the order of the two, they are internal and external.

original: nang gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas yin la /
analyzed: nang gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas yin la /
translated: The internal is the domain of consciousness.

original: gnas de la rnam par shes pa yul gcig pa'i don gyis brten pas dang po bstan la /
analyzed: gnas de la rnam par shes pa yul gcig pa'i don gyis brten pas dang po bstan la /
translated: The first is taught because consciousness is supported by that domain in the sense of having the same object.

original: @49a * // phyi'i ni dmigs pa yin pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: @49a * // phyi'i ni dmigs pa yin pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The external is the object of consciousness, so it is taught after that.

original: drug gi go rims ni dang por mig dang gzugs bstan pa nas tha mar yid dang chos kyi skya mched bstan pa'i bar gyis te /
analyzed: drug gi go rims ni dang por mig dang gzugs bstan pa nas tha mar yid dang chos kyi skya mched bstan pa'i bar gyis te /
translated: The order of the six is taught in the order of the first eye and form up to the last mind and phenomena.

original: de yang mi gnas reg bya'i bar ni rgyu rnam pa drug gi go rims de ltar bstan te /
analyzed: de yang mi gnas reg bya'i bar ni rgyu rnam pa drug gi go rims de ltar bstan te /
translated: The order of the six causes is taught in that order up to the last tangible object.

original: mig dang gzugs ni spyod yul ches phal che ba dang / sna tshogs pa dang yang dang yang 'byung ba'i phyir dang por bstan to //
analyzed: mig dang gzugs ni spyod yul ches phal che ba dang / sna tshogs pa dang yang dang yang 'byung ba'i phyir dang por bstan to //
translated: Eye and form are taught first because they are the most common domain and are various and occur repeatedly.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang rim gyis de bzhin pas de'i 'og tu rim gyis bstan te /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang rim gyis de bzhin pas de'i 'og tu rim gyis bstan te /
translated: The rest are also taught in that order, so they are taught in that order after that.

original: de ni rgyu dang po yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu dang po yin no //
translated: That is the first cause.

original: yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rjes su 'jug pa las te /
analyzed: yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rjes su 'jug pa las te /
translated: Also, it is from following worldly conventions.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams ni dang por gcig la gcig lta bar byed pas de'i phyir mig dang / gzugs dang por bstan to //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams ni dang por gcig la gcig lta bar byed pas de'i phyir mig dang / gzugs dang por bstan to //
translated: The worldly first look at each other, therefore, eye and form are taught first.

original: de'i 'og tu kun du smra bar byed pas rna ba dang sgra bstan to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu kun du smra bar byed pas rna ba dang sgra bstan to //
translated: Then, they speak to each other, therefore, ear and sound are taught next.

original: de'i 'og tu 'dus shing za ba dang / lhag par za bar byed pas na sna dang dri dang por myong bas sna dang dri bstan to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'dus shing za ba dang / lhag par za bar byed pas na sna dang dri dang por myong bas sna dang dri bstan to //
translated: Then, they come together and enjoy themselves, therefore, nose and odor are taught first, since one experiences odor with the nose.

original: de'i 'og tu lce dang / ro myong bas lce dang ro bstan to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu lce dang / ro myong bas lce dang ro bstan to //
translated: Then, they taste with the tongue, therefore, tongue and taste are taught next.

original: de'i 'og tu nyi ma nub cing nam sros pa nam la shom zhing ma la stan la sogs pa'i reg pa la rten par byed pas lus dang reg bya bstan te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu nyi ma nub cing nam sros pa nam la shom zhing ma la stan la sogs pa'i reg pa la rten par byed pas lus dang reg bya bstan te /
translated: Then, the sun sets, night falls, and they prepare their beds, etc., and rely on the tactile objects of the bed, etc., therefore, body and tactility are taught last.

original: de ni rgyu gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu gnyis pa yin no //
translated: This is the second reason.

original: yang dga' ba'i bye brag gi gnas las te /
analyzed: yang dga' ba'i bye brag gi gnas las te /
translated: Also, in terms of the basis of the specific joy.

original: mig gis ni rgyang ring po nas gzugs mthong bas dga' ba'i bye brag skye bas dang por mig dang gzugs bstan to //
analyzed: mig gis ni rgyang ring po nas gzugs mthong bas dga' ba'i bye brag skye bas dang por mig dang gzugs bstan to //
translated: Since one sees form from afar with the eye, specific joy arises, therefore, eye and form are taught first.

original: lhag ma rnams rim gyis de bzhin pas de'i 'og tu rim gyis bstan te /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams rim gyis de bzhin pas de'i 'og tu rim gyis bstan te /
translated: The other sense faculties are taught in order, because they are similar to the eye.

original: de ni rgyu gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu gsum pa yin no //
translated: This is the third reason.

original: yang mdzes pa'i bye brag yongs su 'dzin pa las te /
analyzed: yang mdzes pa'i bye brag yongs su 'dzin pa las te /
translated: Again, they are taught in order, because they are the most beautiful.

original: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyi mig tshugs dang / mig sman la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni mig go //
analyzed: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyi mig tshugs dang / mig sman la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni mig go //
translated: The eye is the most beautiful among the sense faculties, because those who enjoy sense objects beautify the eye with eye ointment, etc.

original: rna cha dang rna rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni rna ba yin no //
analyzed: rna cha dang rna rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni rna ba yin no //
translated: The ear is the most beautiful, because they beautify the ear with earrings, etc.

original: gzhan ni de lta ma yin pas rim bzhin bstan te /
analyzed: gzhan ni de lta ma yin pas rim bzhin bstan te /
translated: The others are not like that.

original: de ni rgyu bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu bzhi pa yin no //
translated: This is the fourth reason.

original: yang bya ba dang / zas dang / 'khrig pa'i dbang las te /
analyzed: yang bya ba dang / zas dang / 'khrig pa'i dbang las te /
translated: Again, they are taught in order, because they are the most important for action, food, and sex.

original: sems can rnams ni lus dang ngag gi las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag gis thams cad la rtsol bar byed /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni lus dang ngag gi las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag gis thams cad la rtsol bar byed /
translated: Beings strive for and strive after all things by means of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions of body and speech.

original: yongs su rtsol bar byed pas mig dang / gzugs dang / rna ba dang / sgra bstan to //
analyzed: yongs su rtsol bar byed pas mig dang / gzugs dang / rna ba dang / sgra bstan to //
translated: The eye and form, the ear and sound are taught because of that.

original: de'i 'og tu kham gyi @49b zas dag za bar byed pas sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro ston to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu kham gyi @49b zas dag za bar byed pas sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro ston to //
translated: Then, since one eats gross food, the nose and smell are taught.

original: de'i 'og tu tshim zhing rgyas pa dang 'khrig pa sten par byed pas lus dang reg bya bstan te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu tshim zhing rgyas pa dang 'khrig pa sten par byed pas lus dang reg bya bstan te /
translated: Then, since one experiences satisfaction, fullness, and sexual intercourse, the body and the tangible are taught.

original: de ni rgyu lnga ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu lnga ba yin no //
translated: This is the fifth reason.

original: yang las dang bya ba'i bye brag yongs su 'dzin pa las te /
analyzed: yang las dang bya ba'i bye brag yongs su 'dzin pa las te /
translated: Moreover, the order is in accordance with the order of grasping the distinctions of action and function.

original: mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas 'gro ba la sogs pa la dka' ba byed pas dang por mig dang gzugs bstan to //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas 'gro ba la sogs pa la dka' ba byed pas dang por mig dang gzugs bstan to //
translated: Since the eye sees forms and one engages in difficult activities such as going and so on, the eye and form are taught first.

original: rna bas ni sgra sna tshogs dag nyan pa la sogs par byed de /
analyzed: rna bas ni sgra sna tshogs dag nyan pa la sogs par byed de /
translated: The ear hears various sounds and so on.

original: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu rna ba dang sgra bstan to //
analyzed: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu rna ba dang sgra bstan to //
translated: Since its function is easier than the previous one, the ear and sound are taught next.üîΩThe nose smells various smells and so on.

original: sna ni dri sna tshogs dag snom pa la sogs par byed de snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu sna dang dri bstan to //
analyzed: sna ni dri sna tshogs dag snom pa la sogs par byed de snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu sna dang dri bstan to //
translated: Since its function is easier than the previous ones, the nose and smell are taught next.

original: lce ni ro sna tshogs dag myong ba la sogs par byed de /
analyzed: lce ni ro sna tshogs dag myong ba la sogs par byed de /
translated: The tongue experiences various tastes and so on.

original: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu lce dang ro bstan to //
analyzed: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu lce dang ro bstan to //
translated: Since it is easier than the former, the tongue and taste are taught after that.

original: lus ni reg bya sna tshogs dag reg pa la sogs par byed de /
analyzed: lus ni reg bya sna tshogs dag reg pa la sogs par byed de /
translated: The body is the basis for the experience of various kinds of tactile objects.

original: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu lus dang reg bya bstan te ;
analyzed: snga ma bas las sla bas de'i 'og tu lus dang reg bya bstan te ;
translated: Since it is easier than the former, the body and tactile objects are taught after that.

original: de ni rgyu drug pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyu drug pa yin no //
translated: This is the sixth cause.

original: yid dang chos ni mig la sogs pa'i drug po de dag gi rnam grangs thams cad dang thams cad du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi tha mar bstan par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: yid dang chos ni mig la sogs pa'i drug po de dag gi rnam grangs thams cad dang thams cad du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi tha mar bstan par rig par bya ste /
translated: The mental faculty and mental objects are taught last of all because they are the enumeration of all the six sense faculties beginning with the eye, and they are all-pervading.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the principle of the arrangement of the sense bases.

original: de la skye mched rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the principle of the inclusion of the sense bases?

original: mig la sogs pa lnga dang / gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa'i gzugs ni gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pas gzugs kyi phung pos phung po dang / skye mched dang ;üîΩkhams dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po dag bsdu bar sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa lnga dang / gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa'i gzugs ni gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pas gzugs kyi phung pos phung po dang / skye mched dang ; khams dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po dag bsdu bar sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The five sense faculties such as the eye, the five sense objects such as form, and the imperceptible forms belonging to the sense base of mental objects are included in the form aggregate.üîΩThe form aggregate includes the aggregates, sense bases, elements, limbs of existence, bases and non-bases, and faculties, just as previously explained.

original: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por gtogs pas rnam par shes pa'i phung bos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang ; srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po dag bsdu ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por gtogs pas rnam par shes pa'i phung bos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang ; srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po dag bsdu ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The mental sense base is included in the consciousness aggregate. Therefore, the consciousness aggregate includes the aggregates, sense bases, elements, limbs of existence, bases and non-bases, and faculties, just as previously explained.

original: chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gsum ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung por gtogs pas @50a * //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gsum ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung por gtogs pas @50a * //
translated: The three of feeling, perception, and formation that are part of the phenomena source are included in the aggregates of feeling, perception, and formation.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung pos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnad dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po du dag bsdus pa sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung pos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / gnad dang gnas ma yin pa dang / dbang po du dag bsdus pa sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The aggregates of feeling, perception, and formation should be applied just as they were previously explained to be included in the aggregates, bases, elements, branches of existence, and faculties and nonfaculties.

original: chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas pa rnam pa bzhi ni khams su ma gtogs pa yin pas phung po la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma bsdus so //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas pa rnam pa bzhi ni khams su ma gtogs pa yin pas phung po la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma bsdus so //
translated: The four types of unconditioned phenomena that are part of the phenomena source are not included in the elements and therefore are not included in any of the aggregates and so on.

original: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang / 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched gnyis dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang / 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched gnyis dang /
translated: Again, the Bhagavan taught the eight bases of subjugation, the ten bases of totality, the four such as the base of infinite space, the two bases of nonapperception and neither discernment nor nondiscernment,üîΩand the base of contact and so on.

original: reg pa'i skye mched la sogs pa skye mched kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa ci rigs par bsdus par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: reg pa'i skye mched la sogs pa skye mched kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa ci rigs par bsdus par rig par bya ste /
translated: These phenomena that are taught using the term base should be understood as being included within the twelve bases in accordance with their characteristics.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the bases.

original: de la skye mched rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skye mched rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the support of the bases?

original: skye mched gzugs can rnams ni gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pas gzugs kyi phung po gnas drug la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: skye mched gzugs can rnams ni gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pas gzugs kyi phung po gnas drug la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The six sense bases that are material form are included in the aggregate of form. Therefore, the aggregate of form is engaged in relation to the six sense bases that are its own foundation, just as was previously explained.

original: skye mched gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po bzhir gtogs pas ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po bzhi po dag gnas bdun la brten pas 'jug par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: skye mched gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po bzhir gtogs pas ming gis bsdus pa'i phung po bzhi po dag gnas bdun la brten pas 'jug par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The four sense bases that are not material form are included in the four aggregates that are included in name. Therefore, the four aggregates that are included in name are engaged in relation to the seven sense bases that are their own foundation, just as was previously explained.

original: de ni skye mched rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye mched rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the foundations of the sense bases.

original: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag gi sgo nas sems can du gdags pa'i dngos pos phyi nang gi longs spyod nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag gi sgo nas sems can du gdags pa'i dngos pos phyi nang gi longs spyod nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
translated: The twelve sense bases are presented in the way that was just explained. Through them, sentient beings are designated and experience both internal and external objects.

original: des ni de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po bstan to //
analyzed: des ni de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po bstan to //
translated: This explains the objects that are experienced by those sentient beings.

original: de 'byung ba'i dngos po zhes bya bas ni khams rnams bstan te /
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i dngos po zhes bya bas ni khams rnams bstan te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe entities that give rise to them‚Äù indicates the elements.

original: de la khams ni bco brgyad de /
analyzed: de la khams ni bco brgyad de /
translated: There are eighteen elements:

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams @50b dang ; sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams @50b dang ; sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: the eye element, the form element, the eye consciousness element, the ear element, the sound element, the ear consciousness element, the nose element, the smell element, the nose consciousness element,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: the tongue element, the taste element, the tongue consciousness element, the body element, the tangible element, the body consciousness element, the mind element, the entity element, and the mind consciousness element.

original: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa drug gis bstan to //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa drug gis bstan to //
translated: Their presentation is indicated in six ways.

original: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
translated: 5. by their inclusion;üîΩ6. by their support.

original: de la khams rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /üîΩmig gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mig ma spangs pa'am /
analyzed: de la khams rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / mig gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mig ma spangs pa'am /
translated: What is the definition of the elements according to their intrinsic nature?

original: spangs pa srog gi dbang pos yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: spangs pa srog gi dbang pos yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the eye element is the eye which is the support of visual consciousness, whether it is the cause of visual consciousness or not, whether it is accompanied by visual consciousness or not, whether it is abandoned or not abandoned by the path of the adepts.

original: mig gi khams ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi khams ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: The same for the element of the eye.üîΩThe same for the elements of the ear, nose, tongue, body and mental faculty.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas ma gtogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas ma gtogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The element of factors is, with the exception of the part of the element of factors which is unconditioned, the mental consciousness and the part of the element of factors which is associated with the mental consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi khams ni ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyis byung ba'i gzugs gang yin pa de la de'i dbang gis gzugs kyi khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams ni ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyis byung ba'i gzugs gang yin pa de la de'i dbang gis gzugs kyi khams zhes bya'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the element of visible form is the visible form which is the object of the eye sense-faculty. It is called the element of visible form because it is the cause of the visual consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i khams rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i khams rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The elements of sound, odor, taste, and touch should be understood in the same way as the form element.

original: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni yongs su g-yo ba'i gzhi dang / mi skye ba'i gzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin de /
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni yongs su g-yo ba'i gzhi dang / mi skye ba'i gzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin de /
translated: The part of the element of mental objects that is unconditioned has the nature of a basis for the non-arising of the unconditioned.

original: de ni khams rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the natures of the elements.

original: de la khams rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the meanings of the elements?

original: rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is twofold:

original: nges pa'i tshig dang / dgos pa'o //üîΩde la nges pa'i tshig ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig dang / dgos pa'o // de la nges pa'i tshig ni /
translated: verbal expression and purpose.üîΩWhat is verbal expression?

original: ci'i phyir khams zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khams zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why are they called elements?

original: khams kyi don bstan pa ste /
analyzed: khams kyi don bstan pa ste /
translated: It is the teaching of the meaning of element.

original: khams kyi don ni rgyu'i don dang / sa bon gyi don dang / rang bzhin gyi don dang / rigs kyi don dang / cha phra ba'i don dang / gzhi'i don to //
analyzed: khams kyi don ni rgyu'i don dang / sa bon gyi don dang / rang bzhin gyi don dang / rigs kyi don dang / cha phra ba'i don dang / gzhi'i don to //
translated: The meaning of element is the meaning of cause, the meaning of seed, the meaning of nature, the meaning of class, the meaning of subtle aspect, and the meaning of basis.

original: dgos pa ni ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: dgos pa ni ci'i phyir na /
translated: What is the purpose?

original: khams rnam par gzhag pa yongs su bstan zhe na /
analyzed: khams rnam par gzhag pa yongs su bstan zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the elements?

original: khams rnam par gzhag pa'i dgos pa bstan pa ste /üîΩrgyu'i rkyen yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang / dbang po dang yul @51a * //
analyzed: khams rnam par gzhag pa'i dgos pa bstan pa ste / rgyu'i rkyen yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang / dbang po dang yul @51a * //
translated: The purpose of the presentation of the elements is to be understood as follows:üîΩin order to demonstrate the causal condition,üîΩin order to demonstrate the faculties, objects, and experiences,

original: dang nye bar spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: dang nye bar spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: and in order to demonstrate the pure and impure elements.

original: de ni khams rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams rnams kyi don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the purpose of the presentation of the elements.

original: de la khams rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the classification of the elements?

original: mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: In brief, it is of six kinds:

original: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i khams ni mig la sogs pa dag gi khams rnams so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i khams ni mig la sogs pa dag gi khams rnams so //
translated: The element that holds the characteristics is the elements of the eye, etc.

original: dag pa'i khams ni gang zag rigs la gnas pa rnams kyi khams dag pa yin no //
analyzed: dag pa'i khams ni gang zag rigs la gnas pa rnams kyi khams dag pa yin no //
translated: The pure element is the pure element of those who are established in the spiritual lineage.

original: rang bzhin gyi khams ni khams bco brgyad po ji skad bstan pa de dag nyid thog ma med pa'i dus nas rab tu grub pa gang yin pa dang / gang zag rigs la gnas pa dang / rigs la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khams ni khams bco brgyad po ji skad bstan pa de dag nyid thog ma med pa'i dus nas rab tu grub pa gang yin pa dang / gang zag rigs la gnas pa dang / rigs la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
translated: The element of intrinsic nature is the eighteen elements as they have been presented, which have existed from beginningless time.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa'i chos nyid du rab tu grub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa'i chos nyid du rab tu grub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The element of the person who is established in the spiritual lineage and who is not established in the spiritual lineage is established as the reality of those who attain nirvana and those who do not attain nirvana.

original: yongs su bsgom pa'i khams ni sngon dge ba dang / mi dge ba yongs su bsgom pa de dag 'khor bar skye ba dang / 'bri ba dang / bye brag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsgom pa'i khams ni sngon dge ba dang / mi dge ba yongs su bsgom pa de dag 'khor bar skye ba dang / 'bri ba dang / bye brag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyu gang yin pa'o //
translated: The element of complete development is the cause for the increase and decrease of those who are born in samsara and for the attainment of nirvana, due to the complete development of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: 'bras bu skye ba'i khams ni de dag nyid 'bras bu bskyed nas 'gags pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba'i khams ni de dag nyid 'bras bu bskyed nas 'gags pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The element of the arising of the result is that which ceases after producing a result.

original: 'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i khams ni de dag nyid 'bras bu ma bskyed la /üîΩma 'gags pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i khams ni de dag nyid 'bras bu ma bskyed la /üîΩma 'gags pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The element of the nonarising of the result is that which does not produce a result.üîΩThe element of the noncessation of the result is that which does not cease without producing a result.

original: de ni khams rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the classification of the elements.

original: de la khams rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the order of the elements?

original: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: In brief, it is twofold:

original: gsum gyi go rims dang / drug gi go rims so //
analyzed: gsum gyi go rims dang / drug gi go rims so //
translated: the order of the three and the order of the six.

original: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin du ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin du ci rigs par sbyar te /
translated: Their classification should be understood according to the S≈´tra method, as appropriate.

original: de ni khams rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the order of the elements.

original: de la khams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams kyi bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the inclusion of the elements?

original: skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: It should be understood according to the S≈´tra method, as appropriate.

original: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las khams drug dang / khams gsum dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gnyis dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / sems can gyi khams dang / gdul ba'i @51b khams dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las khams drug dang / khams gsum dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gnyis dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / sems can gyi khams dang / gdul ba'i @51b khams dang /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn also taught the six elements, three elements, two elements of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, the element of the world, the element of phenomena, the element of sentient beings, the element of those to be trained,

original: gdul ba'i khams kyi thabs la sogs pa khams kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: gdul ba'i khams kyi thabs la sogs pa khams kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang /
translated: and the element of the means of training, and so on, using the term ‚Äúelement.‚Äù

original: khams bco brgyad po dag gi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pas ci rigs par bsdus par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad po dag gi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pas ci rigs par bsdus par rig par bya ste /
translated: Those phenomena should be understood as included in the eighteen elements in the appropriate way, according to the characteristics of the eighteen elements that were explained.

original: de ni khams rnams kyi bsdu ba dang rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams rnams kyi bsdu ba dang rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: That is the inclusion and presentation of the elements.

original: de la khams rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams rnams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the basis of the elements?

original: skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: skye mched kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin ci rigs par sbyar te /
translated: It should be applied in the appropriate way, as was presented in the section on the sense bases.

original: de ni khams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni khams kyi rten rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: That is the presentation of the basis of the elements.

original: khams bco brgyad kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag las sems can du gdags pa'i dngos po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir des ni de 'byung ba'i dngos po bstan to //
analyzed: khams bco brgyad kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa de dag las sems can du gdags pa'i dngos po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir des ni de 'byung ba'i dngos po bstan to //
translated: The eighteen elements are presented in this way. The presentation of the elements that are the source of sentient beings is taught by the words ‚Äúthe source of sentient beings.üîΩThe presentation of the elements that are the source of the world is taught by the words ‚Äúthe source of the world.

original: de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba nas zas rnams bstan te /
analyzed: de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba nas zas rnams bstan te /
translated: The presentation of the elements that are the source of food is taught by the words ‚Äúthe source of food.

original: de la zas ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la zas ni bzhi ste /
translated: There are four kinds of food:

original: khams kyi zas dang / reg pa'i zas dang / yid la sems pa'i zas dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas so //
analyzed: khams kyi zas dang / reg pa'i zas dang / yid la sems pa'i zas dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas so //
translated: food that is derived from the elements, food that is derived from contact, food that is derived from mental intention, and food that is derived from consciousness.

original: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa drug gis bstan te /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam pa drug gis bstan te /
translated: The presentation of the four kinds of food should be understood in terms of six topics:

original: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / don dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / go rims dang / bsdu ba dang / rten gyis so //
translated: their essential nature, their meaning, their classification, their sequence, their summary, and their basis.

original: de la zas rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zas rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the essential nature of food?

original: kham gyi zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i skye mched gsum gyis bsdus pa'i kham gyi zas yongs su 'jug pa'i tshe /
analyzed: kham gyi zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i skye mched gsum gyis bsdus pa'i kham gyi zas yongs su 'jug pa'i tshe /
translated: The essential nature of food that consists of morsels is the three sense sources of smell, taste, and tactility that are contained in morsels of food when they are being consumed.

original: dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mthu dang / rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing /
analyzed: dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mthu dang / rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing /
translated: It benefits consciousness through the power of smell, taste, and tactility, and through the power of its own karmic ripening.

original: phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po gzugs can lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dbang po'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing /
analyzed: phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po gzugs can lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dbang po'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing /
translated: The powerful consciousness that is thus benefited causes the five physical sense faculties, the mental faculty, and the great elements that are the basis of the sense faculties to increase,

original: yangs pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //üîΩreg pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni reg pa'i skye mched drug gis bsdus pa'i reg pa bde ba'am /
analyzed: yangs pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o // reg pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni reg pa'i skye mched drug gis bsdus pa'i reg pa bde ba'am /
translated: expand, and flourish.

original: yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi tshor ba skyed par byed pa da ltar byung ba'i bde ba 'am /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi tshor ba skyed par byed pa da ltar byung ba'i bde ba 'am /
translated: The essence of contact as sustenance is contact that is included in the six sense bases of contact and that generates the feelings of pleasure, mental pleasure, and equanimity.

original: btang snyoms kyi stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing /
translated: It benefits consciousness through the power of the present pleasure or equanimity.

original: phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po @52a * //
analyzed: phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po @52a * //
translated: The powerful consciousness that is thus benefited causes the five physical sense faculties,üîΩthe mental faculty, and the great elements that are the basis of the sense faculties to increase,üîΩexpand, and flourish.

original: gzugs can lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dbang po'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing yangs pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dbang po'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing yangs pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The five physical faculties, the mental faculty and the great elements that are the basis of the faculties increase, expand and flourish.

original: yid la sems pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i sems pa yul 'dod pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yang dag pa'i thabs nyon mongs pa can nam /
analyzed: yid la sems pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i sems pa yul 'dod pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yang dag pa'i thabs nyon mongs pa can nam /
translated: The nature of mental satisfaction that is food is intention that is included in the phenomena element. It is a defiled or undefiled correct method that is the cause of obtaining a desired object.

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa la brten nas re ba'i yid bde ba ma 'ongs pa'i yul la dmigs pas ma 'ongs pa'i yul 'dod pa thob tu re ba'i yid la sems pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing phan btags pa'i
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa la brten nas re ba'i yid bde ba ma 'ongs pa'i yul la dmigs pas ma 'ongs pa'i yul 'dod pa thob tu re ba'i yid la sems pa'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing phan btags pa'i
translated: Based on that, the power of mental satisfaction that is intention in the mind that is hope for a future object, focusing on a future object, increases consciousness and benefits it.

original: rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po gzugs can lnga dang yid kyi dbang po'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing yangs pa dang rgyas par gyur ba gang yin pa'o //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ni nyid kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa rnam par shes pa zas gsum po rnams kyi da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa la dmigs pas phan btags shing stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po gzugs can lnga dang /
