translated: Thus it performs the function of food.

original: reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas kyis ni so so'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing yangs pa dang /
analyzed: reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas kyis ni so so'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa la phan 'dogs par byed cing phan btags pa'i rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa des dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po rnams 'phel zhing yangs pa dang /
translated: The foods of contact, intention, and consciousness benefit consciousness by their individual powers. The consciousness that is benefited by that strong consciousness increases the faculties and the great elements, and expands and develops them.

original: rgyas par byed pas zas kyi bya ba byed do //
analyzed: rgyas par byed pas zas kyi bya ba byed do //
translated: Thus it performs the function of food.

original: de la rnam par shes pa ji ltar na yid kyi dbang po'i zas yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa ji ltar na yid kyi dbang po'i zas yin zhe na /
translated: How is consciousness the food of the mental faculty?

original: de ltar zas rnam pa gsum gyis nye bar brtags @54a * //
analyzed: de ltar zas rnam pa gsum gyis nye bar brtags @54a * //
translated: Thus, one should examine the three types of food.üîΩ

original: pa'i rnam par shes pa de yid kyi dbang po gong nas gong du ches brtas pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan par skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i rnam par shes pa de yid kyi dbang po gong nas gong du ches brtas pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan par skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the consciousness that is investigated by means of the three types of food is the cause for the growth and increase of the mental faculty.

original: mu bzhir bcad pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /üîΩkham gang yin pa de zas kyang yin la /
analyzed: mu bzhir bcad pa'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na / kham gang yin pa de zas kyang yin la /
translated: What is the analysis of the four possibilities?üîΩIs everything that is morsel food also food?

original: zas gang yin pa de yang kham yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: zas gang yin pa de yang kham yin nam zhe na /
translated: Or, is everything that is food also morsel food?

original: mu bzhi ste /üîΩkham yin la zas ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: mu bzhi ste / kham yin la zas ma yin pa ni /
translated: There are four possibilities.

original: kham gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: kham gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Morsel food that is not food is that which does not nourish the faculties and the elements.

original: zas yin la kham ma yin pa ni reg pa dang / yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zas yin la kham ma yin pa ni reg pa dang / yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Food that is not morsel food is contact, intention, and consciousness that nourish the faculties and the elements.

original: zas kyang yin la kham yang yin pa ni kham gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zas kyang yin la kham yang yin pa ni kham gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Morsel food that is also food is that which nourishes the faculties and the elements.

original: kham yang ma yin la zas kyang ma yin pa ni reg pa dang / yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: kham yang ma yin la zas kyang ma yin pa ni reg pa dang / yid la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That which is neither food nor not food is contact, intention, and consciousness, when they do not cause the faculties and the great elements to increase.

original: reg pa la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la yang mu bzhi de bzhin du ci rigs par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: reg pa la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la yang mu bzhi de bzhin du ci rigs par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The remaining members, such as contact, should be similarly classified into four alternatives, as appropriate.

original: de ni zas rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni zas rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the classification of the nutriments.

original: de la zas rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na ;
analyzed: de la zas rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na ;
translated: What is the presentation of the order of the nutriments?

original: rnam pa lnga'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam pa lnga'i phyir te /
translated: It is on the basis of five aspects:

original: mang ba'i rim pa dang / brda phrad pa'i rim pa dang / phan 'dogs pa'i rim pa dang / srog gi dbang po 'dzin pa'i rim pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mang ba'i rim pa dang / brda phrad pa'i rim pa dang / phan 'dogs pa'i rim pa dang / srog gi dbang po 'dzin pa'i rim pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the order of abundance, the order of the acquisition of verbal communication, the order of benefit, the order of the grasping of the life faculty, and the order of the establishment of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de la mang ba'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i kham du bya ba'i zas sgo mang po sna tshogs nas byung ba dang por bstan to //üîΩreg pa'i zas ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi tshor ba skyed par byed pa'i reg pa'i tshogs nyi tshe las byung bas snga mas kyang nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: de la mang ba'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i kham du bya ba'i zas sgo mang po sna tshogs nas byung ba dang por bstan to // reg pa'i zas ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi tshor ba skyed par byed pa'i reg pa'i tshogs nyi tshe las byung bas snga mas kyang nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The order of their abundance is as follows: the food of morsel is taught first, because it is the most abundant, being composed of the sense-fields of odor, taste, and tangibility, and being the food that is chewed in the mouth.üîΩThe food of contact is taught next, because it is less abundant than the former, being produced only from a part of the aggregate of contact that produces the sensations of pleasure, mental pleasure, and indifference.

original: yid la sems pa'i zas ni yul 'dod pa thob tu re ba la sems pa'i yid la sems pa 'ba' zhig las byung bas snga ma bas kyang ches nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: yid la sems pa'i zas ni yul 'dod pa thob tu re ba la sems pa'i yid la sems pa 'ba' zhig las byung bas snga ma bas kyang ches nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of mental volition is taught next, because it is even less abundant than the former, being produced only from the mental volition that hopes to obtain desired objects.

original: rnam par shes pa'i zas snga ma gsum po dag gis phan btags pa'i rnam @54b par shes pa nyi tshe las byung bas snga ma bas kyang ches shin tu nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zas snga ma gsum po dag gis phan btags pa'i rnam @54b par shes pa nyi tshe las byung bas snga ma bas kyang ches shin tu nyung ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of consciousness is taught later than the former three foods because it arises from consciousness that is benefited by the former three foods and because it is much less than the former.

original: brda phrad par sla ba'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni byis pa yan chad kyis kyang gzung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rtogs par sal bas dang por bstan to //
analyzed: brda phrad par sla ba'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni byis pa yan chad kyis kyang gzung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rtogs par sal bas dang por bstan to //
translated: The order in which they are easily understood is as follows: because physical food is grasped, engaged, and understood by all, from children on up, it is taught first.

original: reg pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang / dmigs pa dang / grogs dang las la sogs pa snga ma bas brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: reg pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang / dmigs pa dang / grogs dang las la sogs pa snga ma bas brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: Because the nature, basis, object, companion, function, and so on of the food of contact are more difficult to understand than the former, it is taught later.

original: yid la sems pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa snga ma bas kyang ches brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: yid la sems pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa snga ma bas kyang ches brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: Because the nature and so on of the food of mental intention is more difficult to understand than the former, it is taught later.

original: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa snga ma bas kyang ches shin tu brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa snga ma bas kyang ches shin tu brda phrad par dka' bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of consciousness is taught later because it is even more difficult to understand than the previous ones, such as the nature of consciousness.

original: phan 'dogs pa'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni dbang po dang / 'byung ba chen po 'phel ba la phan 'dogs pa'i mthu che bas dang por bstan te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni dbang po dang / 'byung ba chen po 'phel ba la phan 'dogs pa'i mthu che bas dang por bstan te /
translated: The order of benefit is as follows: since the food of morsel is the most powerful in benefiting the increase of the faculties and the great elements, it is taught first.

original: reg pa'i zas ni snga ma bas phan 'dogs pa'i mthu chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: reg pa'i zas ni snga ma bas phan 'dogs pa'i mthu chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of contact is taught later because it is less powerful in benefiting than the former.

original: yid la sems pa'i zas ni snga ma bas kyang phan 'dogs pa'i mthu ches chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: yid la sems pa'i zas ni snga ma bas kyang phan 'dogs pa'i mthu ches chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of mental intention is taught later because it is less powerful in benefiting than the former.

original: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni snga ma bas kyang phan 'dogs pa'i mthu ches shin tu chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni snga ma bas kyang phan 'dogs pa'i mthu ches shin tu chung bas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of consciousness is taught later because it is even less powerful in benefiting than the former.

original: srog gi dbang po 'dzin pa'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni de yod na srog gi dbang po re zhig mi 'gags pas dang por bstan to //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po 'dzin pa'i rim pa ni kham gyi zas ni de yod na srog gi dbang po re zhig mi 'gags pas dang por bstan to //
translated: The order of holding the faculty of life force is as follows: since the faculty of life force is not interrupted for a while when it exists, the food of morsel is taught first.

original: reg pa'i zas ni kham gyi zas med na de yod kyang srog gi dbang po myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //üîΩyid la sems pa'i zas ni kham dang reg pa'i zas med na de yod kyang srog gi dbang po ches myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: reg pa'i zas ni kham gyi zas med na de yod kyang srog gi dbang po myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to // yid la sems pa'i zas ni kham dang reg pa'i zas med na de yod kyang srog gi dbang po ches myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of contact is taught later than the food of morsel, because if the food of morsel is absent, the faculty of life will be quickly arrested, even if the other foods are present.üîΩThe food of mental volition is taught later than the food of contact, because if the food of contact is absent, the faculty of life will be quickly arrested, even if the other foods are present.üîΩThe food of consciousness is taught later than the food of mental volition, because if the food of mental volition is absent, the faculty of life will be quickly arrested, even if the other foods are present.

original: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni kham dang / reg pa dang / yid la sems pa'i zas med na gtan med pas srog gi dbang po ches shin tu myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zas ni kham dang / reg pa dang / yid la sems pa'i zas med na gtan med pas srog gi dbang po ches shin tu myur du 'gags pas de'i 'og tu bstan to //
translated: The food of consciousness is taught later than the food of mental volition, because if the food of mental volition is absent, the faculty of life will be quickly arrested, even if the other foods are present.
